meanings.meaning_en_US: Next in order or sequence.

examples.sentence: The [following] chapters will explain the details.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 接下來的章節將解釋細節。

examples.sentence: Please read the [following] instructions carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請仔細閱讀接下來的指示。

examples.sentence: The [following] items are required for the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 接下來的項目是該專案所需。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To transfer data from one computer system to another, typically from the internet to a local computer.

examples.sentence: You can [download] the latest version of the software from our website.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以從我們的網站下載最新版本的軟體。

examples.sentence: Make sure to [download] all the files you need before the deadline.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保在截止日前下載所有需要的檔案。

examples.sentence: I will [download] the movie for later viewing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會下載這部電影以便日後觀看。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the absence of; not having.

examples.sentence: I can't live [without] my phone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我無法沒有我的手機生活。

examples.sentence: She finished the project [without] any help.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在沒有任何幫助的情況下完成了這個項目。

examples.sentence: Living [without] fear is important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 沒有恐懼地生活非常重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: For each; for every.

examples.sentence: The speed limit is 60 miles [per] hour.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 限速是每小時60英里。

examples.sentence: The fee is $10 [per] person.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 費用是每人10美元。

examples.sentence: You need to water the plants once [per] week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要每週澆水一次。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Elucidating or occurring now; contemporary.

examples.sentence: The current trends in fashion are fascinating.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 當前的時尚趨勢非常迷人

examples.sentence: She is studying the current events in politics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在研究當前的政治事件

examples.sentence: His current job is quite challenging.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他現在的工作相當具有挑戰性

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flow of electric charge.

examples.sentence: The circuit needs a steady [current] to function.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電路需要穩定的電流來運行

examples.sentence: Too much [current] can damage the device.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 過多的電流會損壞設備

examples.sentence: The [current] flows through the wires.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電流流經電線

meanings.meaning_en_US: A system of rules created and enforced through social or governmental institutions.

examples.sentence: She studied the [law] at university.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在大學裡學習法律

examples.sentence: The [law] requires everyone to wear a seatbelt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 法律要求每個人都要繫安全帶

examples.sentence: He broke the [law] and was arrested.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他違反了法律並被逮捕

meanings.meaning_en_US: To exercise restraint or direction over; to manage or regulate.

examples.sentence: She tried to [control] her emotions during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她試圖在會議中控制自己的情緒。

examples.sentence: He needed to [control] the temperature while cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在烹飪時需要控制溫度。

examples.sentence: It's important to [control] your spending habits.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 控制你的消費習慣是很重要的。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The power to influence or direct people's behavior or the course of events.

examples.sentence: He has a lot of [control] over the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對這個項目有很大的控制權。

examples.sentence: The [control] of information is crucial in leadership.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 資訊的控制在領導力中是至關重要的。

examples.sentence: They lost [control] of the situation quickly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們很快失去了對情況的控制。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A transparent, odorless, tasteless liquid that forms the basis of the fluids of living beings.

examples.sentence: You need to drink enough [water] every day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你每天需要喝足夠的水。

examples.sentence: The pond has fresh [water].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個池塘裡有新鮮的水。

examples.sentence: They are testing the [water] quality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們正在檢測水質。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to or affecting a person, especially in their private life.

examples.sentence: She shared her [personal] feelings with her friend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她和朋友分享了她的個人感受

examples.sentence: It's important to respect [personal] boundaries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 尊重個人界限很重要

examples.sentence: He has a very [personal] approach to therapy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對療法有著非常個人的方法

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who leads or directs others in a course or journey.

examples.sentence: The [guide] showed us the best places to visit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 導遊帶我們去見識最好玩的地方

examples.sentence: He used a map as a [guide] to navigate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用地圖作為指導來導航

examples.sentence: A good [guide] can make all the difference.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一個好的導遊能帶來不同的體驗

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat, thin, rectangular piece of material used for various purposes.

examples.sentence: The carpenter cut the [board] to size.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 木匠將木板切成合適的大小。

examples.sentence: The sign was painted on a wooden [board].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個標誌是畫在一塊木板上的。

examples.sentence: They decided to use a [board] for the display.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定使用一塊木板做展示。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of the color of pure snow or milk.

examples.sentence: The walls are painted [white].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 牆壁刷成了白色

examples.sentence: She wore a [white] dress to the party.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿著一條白色裙子參加派對

examples.sentence: I prefer [white] bread to brown.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡白麵包勝於棕色麵包

meanings.meaning_en_US: The governing body of a nation, state, or community.

examples.sentence: The [government] announced new policies to improve education.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府宣佈了改善教育的新政策

examples.sentence: Citizens are encouraged to participate in [government] activities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 市民被鼓勵參加政府活動

examples.sentence: The [government] is responsible for maintaining public safety.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 政府負責維護公共安全

meanings.meaning_en_US: To go back to a place or to give something back.

examples.sentence: He will [return] home after the trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他將在旅行後回家。

examples.sentence: Please [return] the book to the library.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請將書籍歸還給圖書館。

examples.sentence: I need to [return] a call.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我需要回覆一通電話。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A record or statement of financial expenditure and receipts relating to a particular period or purpose.

examples.sentence: He opened a savings [account] at the bank.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在銀行開了一個儲蓄帳戶。

examples.sentence: You need to make an [account] of your expenses.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要清點一下你的開支。

examples.sentence: She frequently checks her online banking [account].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她經常檢查她的網上銀行帳戶。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To explain or give a reason for something.

examples.sentence: Can you [account] for your whereabouts last night?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你能解釋你昨晚的行蹤嗎？

examples.sentence: The witness was asked to [account] for the events of the evening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 證人被要求解釋當晚的事件。

examples.sentence: He failed to [account] for the lost funds.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他沒有解釋失去的資金。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The visible shape or configuration of something.

examples.sentence: The sculpture is a unique [form] of art.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這件雕塑是一種獨特的藝術形狀。

examples.sentence: He filled out the admission [form] at the counter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在櫃檯填寫入學表格。

examples.sentence: Their approach to learning takes many [forms].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的學習方式有多種形式。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A representation of the external form of a person or thing in art.

examples.sentence: The [image] of the mountain was breathtaking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那座山的影像美得令人屏息。

examples.sentence: She created an [image] for her project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的專案創建了一個影像。

examples.sentence: The photographer captured the perfect [image].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 攝影師捕捉到了完美的影像。
